translations: v．虐待，不公正对待：对某人或某物进行不公正、不合适或残忍的对待。
· He mistreats his dog by not feeding it properly.
他没有给狗喂食，对狗进行了虐待。

sentences.sentence: You can call it quits if your lover mistreats you.
sentences.translation: 情人没有善待你，可以甩了对方。

sentences.sentence: Even if someone mistreats you, your life will not be hard on you.
sentences.translation: 即使别人亏待了你，你的人生不会亏待你。

sentences.sentence: Misogynist tis a person who hates, dislikes, mistrusts, or mistreats women.
sentences.translation: “厌女症”患者指的是讨厌、不喜欢、不信任、或者虐待女性的人。
